categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: This individual served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic as a Jedi Knight during the final days of the Republic Classic era.

A Force-sensitive, this individual received training in the ways of the Force at an academy and eventually attained the rank of Knight. Accepting the role of General at the beginning of the Clone Wars, this individual was stationed on Murkhana during the last part of the war. Participating in the battle there under the leadership of Jedi Master Saras Loorne, this Jedi was aboard a Republic gunship with Loorne and  another Knight when the Republic's Supreme Chancellor betrayed the Order with the issuance of Contingency Order 66. The clone troopers under this Jedi's command obeyed the executive order and shot down the Jedi's gunship, killing all three.
